description.raw:
Also provide our own unversioned setup.sh.

This pull request depends on an analogous [fix in Gazebo](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/pull-request/178/adding-unversioned-setupsh-for-297/diff).

It's not ideal to push new files into a release branch like this, but it's a pretty important bug to fix.

Also started writing in Gazebo's install prefix, as determined at configure time, into drcsim's generated setup.sh (instead of assuming that drcsim is installing to the same prefix as Gazebo).  I left the fallback of checking /usr for convenience.

Update: retargeted this to default, to appear in 1.2.  It now pulls in some fixes that were done on the 1.1 branch.
